text: These budget cuts are killing the economy. Absolutely killing it.
I think that's a bit of an overstatement.
Is it? Harry Reid just said that the sequester has already cost us one point six million jobs. That's one point six million people out of work because of these stupid cuts.
That number can't be right. That's a massive job loss. The C B O and other economists predicted some job losses, but nowhere near that high. He must be using some very creative math.
He's the Senate Democratic Leader. I think he knows what he's talking about. You just don't want to believe it.
